Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers were favored to win based on their recent performance.
Key Match Events: The Lakers trailed by 12 points and could not recover.
Post-Match Reflections: JJ Redick described the mood in the Lakers locker room as 'disappointed'.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Little Caesars Arena.
Others: The Lakers have struggled defensively this season, with the fourth-worst defensive rating in the league.
